headline: DOVER INSTRUMENT LINEAR STAGE, CLEAN ROOM CLASS
description: Linear Stage/Clean room class    Dover Motion ES400S250CLS
specstable:
Manufacturer Dover Instrument
Model ES400S250CLS
Configuration Single Axis
Total Travel, XYZ X: 15.75 in (400 mm)
Mechanical Drive System Lead screw
Stage Bearing Type Air Bearing
Motor Drive: Stepper Motor
Other Information Resolution .025 in per rev./Air bearings @80PSI Compumotor step motor M/N M52-5-E; S/N 25080 Code C-B
Vertical load 25 lb/ft 110(N)
Horizontal load 30 lb/ft 130(N)
Positional repeatability to 0.004 in
Air bearings
Clean room compatible
